title: Potions and Tinctures Item
description: A record describing an item type in the Potions and Tinctures game

ItemID.description: A unique identifier for this item type

Description.description: A short description of the item

Stackable.description: Whether multiple items can stack in one inventory slot

MaxStack.description: Maximum stack size (only relevant if Stackable is true)

Category.description: Item category for organization and filtering
